content: Which Asian country's national sport is sumo wrestling?

Sumo wrestling is the national sport of Japan. It's a traditional form of wrestling where two rikishi (wrestlers) compete in a circular ring called dohyo. The objective is to force the opponent out of the ring or make any part of their body above the ankle touch the ground. Sumo has a rich history and is deeply ingrained in Japanese culture, with many rituals and ceremonies associated with it.
